title: Super League summaries
text: May 20, 2018 / 1:58 PM / Updated 37 minutes ago UPDATE 2-Super League summaries Reuters Staff 2 Min Read May 20 (OPTA) - summaries from the Super League matches on Sunday Salford (6) 12 Tries: Hauraki (8), Griffin (74) Goals: Lui (9,75) Catalans (10) 26 Tries: Garcia (13), Bousquet (22), Broughton (48,60,62) Goals: Gigot (23,61,71) Referee: Gareth Hewer Ground: St. James' Park Wakefield (6) 22 Tries: Ashurst (32), Jones-Bishop (46,56), Lyne (72) Goals: Finn (33,46,57) Huddersfield (19) 25 Tries: Murphy (10), O'Brien (18), Mamo (23), McIntosh (49) Goals: Brough (11,19,24,50) Drop Goals: Brough (39) Yellow cards: Leeming (44) Referee: James Child Ground: St. James' Park Hull Kingston Rovers (15:30) Hull Ground: St. James' Park Thursday, May 24 fixtures (GMT) Castleford v St Helens (17:45) Friday, May 25 fixtures (GMT) Warrington v Hull (17:45) Hull Kingston Rovers v Wigan (18:00) Salford v Huddersfield (18:00) Widnes v Wakefield (18:00)
